attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of people always blaming young drivers. We are not all idiots. The driving test does not need making harder; it is hard enough already. I had a driver who attempted to make me go into the back of him yesterday and he was not a young driver but a middle aged man. I was also nearly hit by an idiot on a motorway sliproad the other day again not a driver but a middle aged woman. The only thing that needs to be tougher is the traffic laws and their enforcement

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
